message: I propose we split the money 60/40. This is a fair offer considering the decreasing value over time.
Your offer was a little too skewed in your favor, especially considering the inflation. How about we meet closer to the middle?
I understand your point about the inflation, but my initial offer still stands as fair.  I'm willing to keep it on the table, but I can't accept a less favorable split.
Alice, we're running out of time.  I'm taking a hit on my end to find a compromise.  Let's close this deal and both get something!
